version_description:
New Hi-Resolution Mode Setting (Please Use Mute Switch)
Single-Tap Focus and Exposure Control

MAJOR UPDATE September 2019: 
Updated and improved for newest Apple devices and iOS versions.
Now you can start a new recording while previous recording is exporting.
Stabilized telephoto lens support.

NEW: Extreme Stabilization Mode for iPhone 11 Pro Max.
Binoculars updated for iOS 13 and latest iOS devices.
Optimized Telephoto Lens Zoom.

Previous Update: 
Start recording new clip while first clip exporting.

1. Improved 32X Zoom for latest iOS devices.
2. Option to disable location watermark for photos in menu.

Previous Update:
• Extreme Stabilization Mode for iPhone 11 Pro Max.
• Binoculars updated for iOS 13 and latest iOS devices.
• Optimized Telephoto Lens Zoom.
• Start recording new clip while first clip exporting.
